snippet: The Yankees’ managing general partner, Hal Steinbrenner, said that he was concerned about the latest drug allegations swirling around third baseman Alex Rodriguez.
abstract: New York Yankees managing general partner Hal Steinbrenner expresses concern about latest drug allegations swirling around third baseman Alex Rodriguez.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ managing general partner, Hal Steinbrenner, said that he was concerned about the latest drug allegations swirling around third baseman Alex Rodriguez.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Hal Steinbrenner Concerned About Drug Allegations Surrounding Alex Rodriguez
headline.main: Steinbrenner Concerned About Drug Allegations Against Rodriguez
